command: Show me a tabular record of all the men who are New Members and belong to a ministry
sql:
SELECT
  id,
  name,
  gender,
  dob,
  age_group,
  phone_number,
  email,
  about,
  address,
  location,
  house_fellowship,
  invited_by,
  assigned_to,
  ministry,
  status,
  email_verified_at,
  role,
  settings_id,
  remember_token
FROM users
WHERE
  gender = 'Male' AND status = 'New Member' AND ministry IS NOT NULL;
-- This SQL query selects all columns from the 'users' table for men who are 'New Member' and belong to a ministry (ministry is not NULL).
